mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login, password, email, name, gender, passport, age, birthday, address, phone, qq) VALUES(#{login}, md5(#{password}), #{login}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{passport}, ${age}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{qq});
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, passport = #{passport}, birthday = #{birthday}, age = #{age}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, qq = #{qq} WHERE id = #{id}
